title: Sr. Engineering Manager
tagsAndSkills: Computer science,GIT,Team management,Project coordination,Resourcing,Engineering Manager,Agile methodology,Management
jobDescription:
• The XR Experiences team is part of the Design and Customer Experience team in the organization and is responsible for building delightful, consistent, intuitive, and engaging immersive experiences on JioGlass for our B2C customers across Media & Entertainment, Learning, Shopping, Gaming and Productivity; and our B2B enterprise customers across Remote Assistance, Communication & Collaboration and Enterprise learning use-cases.
  • The Engineering Manager position is a management role part of the Program Management Office responsible for resource planning, project coordination within the XR Experiences team as well as coordinating with the engineering managers of the different departments within the company, budget planning, administration, and general client liaison.
  • Coordinated large multi-disciplinary projects with ultimate responsibility for financial control, resourcing management, internal project coordination, administration, and client liaison.
  • Proven ability to manage multiple projects and organise themselves to meet all assigned deadlines.
  • Proactively communicated and collaborated with internal customers to analyse information needs and functional requirements and deliver the following artifacts as needed: Resource Plan, Roadmap, Budget, Risks , etc
  • Critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, decompose high-level information into details, abstract up from low-level information to a general understanding, and distinguish user requests from the underlying true needs.
  • Successfully engage in multiple initiatives simultaneously
  • Serves as the conduit between the product/customer community and the development team through which requirements flow.
  • Agile software delivery process using JIRA (including breaking down work into modular tasks, updating/tracking task status/work log entries for sprint management), Gerrit/Git (source code management including branching strategy, code review) and Automation Tools.
Job Specifications
  • Bachelor s or master s degree in Computer Science, Management or relevant field.
  • 10+ years of experience in managing team of 10-15 developers and designers to drive software product from concept to production.
  • Adept knowledge of software development, Agile methodology and other software project management related tools.
  • Great leadership skills, able to deliver clear feedback to their team members.
  • Proven ability to manage timelines and budget of complex multi-disciplinary projects.
  • Proven ability to manage teams and establish efficient communication channels between internal team members as well as across different teams within the organization.
  • Artistic and creative, familiar with design quality and the strategies involved in creating good designs.
  • Influence others, leading them to understand why certain design aspects matter more than others.
  • Should be able to manage and resolve conflict between individual team members and between different teams

title: Assistant Manager Operations - Domestic process
tagsAndSkills: Escalation Management,Assistant Manager Operations,Project Management,CSAT,Customer Support Operations,Contact Center Operations,Shrinkage Control,People Management
jobDescription:
Hiring Assistant Manager Operations.


Location: Navi Mumbai - Ghansoli


Mandatory: Graduate from any stream


Customer Support Inbound Voice Process for Payment Gateway.


Desirable:

  • Total 5-10 year of work experience.
  • Minimum 2 years experience as Assistant Manager from Customer Support domain
  • Prior experience in managing excellent customer centricity is desired
  • Should manage TLs, SMEs and agents.
  • Experience in sourcing/recruitment or related processes will be an added advantage

Experience

  • Needs to be high on responsibility and ownership
  • Should have managed multiple processes and ensured delivery within timelines
  • Demonstrated ability to understand staffing, process efficiencies, and goal achievement while managing contact center cost
  • Extensive experience with telephony and workforce management software programs
  • Experience in back office/email setup preferred - experience integrating multiple channels into a service model
  • Should have exhibited excellent problem solving, critical thinking and communication skills, a detail-oriented personality, and a collaborative spirit;
  • Proven demonstration of ability to work with diverse team members and manage multiple and competing priorities
  • A commitment to being attentive, persistent, and flexible. Also protective of the integrity and purpose of our organization

Technical Competencies:

  • Ensure ownership for workplace (resolution of all admin, tech issues, etc.)
  • Enable people to excel through grooming and regular feedback
  • Derive valuable insights for improvement through innovation
  • Set up and sustain a robust quality and training framework within teams
  • Increase people engagement, ensure communication and feedback
  • Value Added Services /process improvement leading to business benefits
  • Ensure robust risk and compliance practices maintained
  • Participate in selection process to ensure the right talent is selected in a timely manner
  • Ensure transparency and adequate communication across all levels
  • Maintain a no surprise /nonpolitical atmosphere and take active steps to stop anyone indulging in gossip
  • Create an environment that encourages people to deliver and excel through performance management systems
  • Manage and exceed client expectations
  • Resolve and/or escalate employee grievances in a timely manner

Interested candidates can share CV to matildad@hexaware.com



Warm Regards,

Matilda Dmello

Talent Acquisition Group || Lateral

Email: matildad@hexaware.com
